name: Gear By Gear
description:
<About>

Solve a multitude of gear-pushing puzzles in this steampunk inspired game! Made in under 48 hours, spread across a week!

This is just a test to see how to publish a game on Itch, so it lacks certain polish such as sounds and music. These may or may not come at a later date, depending on my motivation to finish it.

Issues with HTML. Download only for now.

Multiple, unique puzzles with interesting mechanics and a steampunk inspired art style.

<Controls>

Arrow keys for movement.

WASD keys for movement.

Mouse/point-and-click for menus
